text: Half Past Dead 2 is a 2007 American action movie directed by Art Camacho and starring Bill Goldberg and Kurupt. It is a sequel to the 2002 movie Half Past Dead. Kurupt and Tony Plana are the only actors to return from the first movie. The movie was released straight to video in the United States on May 15, 2007. == Cast == * Kurupt as Bernard "Twitch" * Bill Goldberg as William Burke * Angell Conwell as Cherise * Robert Madrid as Alex Cortez * Joe Perez as Lewis * Alona Tal as Ellie Burke * Morocco Omari as J.T. * Jack Conley as Wallace * Robert LaSardo as Rivera * Tony Plana as Warden Juan Ruiz "El Fuego" Escarzaga * Bruce Weitz as Lester McKenna (archive footage) == Other websites == * Category:2007 action movies Category:American action movies Category:American prison movies Category:English-language movies Category:Gangster movies Category:Movies set in Germany Category:Movies set in San Francisco
title: Half Past Dead 2
